title: great tour
text: this was a fantastic tour of the acropolis. our guide christos was amazing, smart, and very friendly.

title: amazing time
text: i am very happy and greatful to have been part of this tour...kostas was an amazing guide and a pleasant and smart person. i highly recommend doing this tour.

title: Bike tour
text:
Great bike tour. Filipa was amazing. Very knowledgeable and friendly.

I highly recommend.

Regards,

Nick

title: Great experience
text: Punctual. Safe. Friendly. Good price. Couldn't ask for anything more. Thanks Angelo. See you again next time I'm in Cabarete. Nick.

title: Good value for money
text: I stayed in Studio C. It was good enough to have a comfortable sleep and showers and chill/relax at times. But I did not spend much time outside of sleeping and bathing inside the hotel/room. It is not a 4 or 5 star place. But the price is good for what you get. Some noise at times from something going on behind my unit outside, and intermittent internet connectivity at times, but overall good host, felt very safe, etc. Would definitely consider staying here again in the future. Nick.
